text: Daniel Jorge Dias Esteves, commonly known as Danny Esteves, (born 29 July 1994) is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays as a forward for C.D. Fátima. In his career Esteves also played for teams such as União de Leiria, G.C. Alcobaça or S.C.
